3D Graph Methods

Requires: Full Development System

Method Description
Clean Data Cleans up the input data by removing all the plots. Details
Reset to Default View Resets the view direction to the default view. Details
Image to Printer Sends the 3D graph image to the default printer. Details
Image to File Saves the 3D graph image to an image file or to the clipboard. Details
Get Picture Control Ref Returns the reference number to the 3D picture control. Details
